__e: There was a ring at the door a while ago, sir.
The telephone rang, he went to answer he forgot about the necklace and changed his suit.
I went over there... and rang the bell, but he wasn't there.
Your time was up, but I missed you because of your ridiculous English climate.
The phone rang, but when I answered there wasn't anyone on the wire.
Well, I would think, Lieutenant, that he rang the bell. Because I was with the manager, no one answered, and so he let himself in with his key.
Bu I forgot my keys, and when I rang the bell at the kitchen door, there was no response.
The front doorbell went just a moment or two ago, and I thought to myself, "I expect that'll be Alan and..."
Well, I would think, Lieutenant, that he rang the bell. Because I was with the manager, no one answered, and so he let himself in with his key.
Bu I forgot my keys, and when I rang the bell at the kitchen door, there was no response.
The front doorbell went just a moment or two ago, and I thought to myself, "I expect that'll be Alan and..."
No one forced you to come out here with me.
I didn't ask him in, my love. Did you?
That is me. Are you his son?
